metadata.title: RHSA-2019:1352: etcd security, bug fix, and enhancement update (Moderate)
metadata.description:
The etcd packages provide a highly available key-value store for shared configuration.

The following packages have been upgraded to a later upstream version: etcd (3.2.26). (BZ#1676902)

Security Fix(es):

* etcd: Improper Authentication in auth/store.go:AuthInfoFromTLS() via gRPC-gateway (CVE-2018-16886)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

bugzilla.text: CVE-2018-16886 etcd: Improper Authentication in auth/store.go:AuthInfoFromTLS() via gRPC-gateway

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
etcd is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
